  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020312</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020312</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Busca regiones de Grecia</string>
            <string language="en">Finding regions in Greece</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden von von Regionen in Griechenland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conclusion des régions en Grèce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando regiões em Greece</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Individuazione delle regioni in Grecia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εύρεση των περιοχών στην Ελλάδα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">La actividad consiste en ir descubriendo nombres de regiones de Grecia, sin caer en la ?trampa? de pulsar otros nombres que no sean regiones.</string>
            <string language="en">This activity allows the students to discover the names of different regions in Greece. They are supposed to click the right names without being tricked into clicking on names that are not names of regions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Grecia</string>
            <string language="en">Greece</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regiones</string>
            <string language="en">regions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität erlaubt den Kursteilnehmern, die
Namen der unterschiedlichen Regionen in Griechenland zu entdecken. 
Sie sollen die rechten Namen klicken, ohne betrogen zu werden in
Namen an klicken, die nicht Namen von Regionen sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité permet aux étudiants de 
découvrir les noms de différentes régions en Grèce. Elles 
sont censées cliquer les bons noms sans être dupé dans 
cliquer sur les noms qui ne sont pas des noms des régions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade permite que os estudantes 
descubram os nomes de regiões diferentes em Greece. São 
supostos para estalar os nomes direitos sem ser enganado em estalar 
sobre os nomes que não são nomes das regiões.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività permette che gli allievi 
scoprano i nomi delle regioni differenti in Grecia. Sono 
supposte per scattare i giusti nomi senza essere ingannato nello 
scattare sopra i nomi che non sono nomi delle regioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα επιτρέπει στους σπουδαστές για να
ανακαλύψει τα ονόματα των διαφορετικών περιοχών στην Ελλάδα. 
Είναι υποτιθέμενοι για να χτυπήσουν τα σωστά ονόματα χωρίς
εξαπάτηση στον κρότο στα ονόματα που δεν είναι ονόματα των 
περιοχών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechenland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Grèce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">régions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Greece</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">regiões</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Grecia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">regioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελλάδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιοχές</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
